fields.description:
Title of Buttons are not displayed properly on a device (Test Case:Titanium.UI.Window TIMOB-6221)

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch Application onto a device
2. Click back and forth between the News and Blogs button

Expected:
The Title of the buttons (News and Blog) should be displayed properly.
fields.summary: Android: Titanium.UI.Window -V8: Title of Buttons are not displayed Correctly on a device
fields.environment:
Titanium SDK version: 2.0.0.v20120321071752
Javascript Engine: V8 
Platform & version: Android 2.2.1
Device Details: Android emulator and Android Motorola Milestone.
Host Operating System: OSX 10.7.3
Titanium Studio version: 2.0.0.201203202130

comments.body: This is related to UI layout and the Test Case should be updated. Not a TIMOB bug.
